original: [演義]  原嘯聚山林、築寨為王，因久慕關羽盛名，遂放火燒寨、遣散部眾以示其誠，隻身跟隨關羽。
text: [演义] The original Xiao gathered in the mountains and forests and built the village as the king. Because of Guan Yu's reputation for a long time, he set fire to the village and dismissed the people to show his sincerity, and followed Guan Yu alone.
